subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Wojtek Wolski tapped in the winning shot 1 minute 16 seconds into overtime Friday night and Milan Hejduk scored twice for the Colorado Avalanche in its 4-3 victory against the visiting Rangers.
snippet: Wojtek Wolski tapped in the winning shot 1 minute 16 seconds into overtime Friday night and Milan Hejduk scored twice for the Colorado Avalanche in its 4-3 victory against the visiting Rangers.
